title: Plan Corrective Maintenance Job
description: A maintenance planner receives a work order to replace a leaking pump and must plan the job.

tasks.description: Review the work order and retrieve the technical specifications for the pump.
tasks.expected_outcome: The planner understands the scope of work and the equipment involved.

tasks.description: Develop a step-by-step job plan, including safety procedures (like isolation and lockout/tagout), required spare parts, tools, and estimated labor hours.
tasks.expected_outcome: A detailed and safe job plan is created.

tasks.description: Order the required spare parts from the warehouse and reserve them for the job.
tasks.expected_outcome: All necessary parts are confirmed to be available and are reserved for this work order.
